channel.title: Hiren’s BootCD 14.0
channel.description:
Hiren's BootCD 14.0 All in One Bootable CD which has all these utilities: [url=http://www.hiren.info/pages/bootcd]here.[/url]
Really useful bootable CD that contains numerous utilities, linux OS, and mini windows XP OS for emergency use. [code] Filename: Hirens.BootCD.14.0.zip Filesize: 495.14 MB (519189647 bytes) ISO MD5: 69F36D88FD971CF6A7EDA9286D5E19F0 ZIP MD5: 38CF0B054E5846489D2B8AC60B6783CF [/code] [code]http://www.hirensbootcd.org/files/Hirens.BootCD.14.0.zip[/code]

item.title: Hiren’s BootCD 14.0
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

eczema3:

Because it’s really easy to stop someone resetting your BIOS so there’s no password so they can tell your pc to boot from USB as first device, and then plug a memory stick in with hiren’s bootcd on it and then resetting your windows password…

what

if their harddrive is encrypted you won’t be doing shit

Read full topic
